title: Sports betting reshaped newsrooms, and it’s “a little gross.” Now, here come the prediction markets
description: Around this time last year, I was listening to The Athletic’s daily NBA podcast. One host recapped the week in professional basketball, ending with the news that player Terry Rozier was under federal investigation as part of a sports betting scandal.1 “Brutal,” his co-host responded. “From that, um, let’s go to our, uh, BetMGM line...
